Constructor Detail

AttachmentView

public AttachmentView(java.lang.String filename,
                      java.io.File file,
                      boolean deleteAfterSend)
Create an attachment view.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file as seen by the browser.
file - The File on the server to be sent.
deleteAfterSend - true to delete the file from the server after sending the view.
